H0.text: In 2009 to what did the United Kingdom’s largest insurance company, Norwich Union, change its name. Aviva UK

H1.text: In 2009 to what did the United Kingdom’s largest insurance company, Norwich Union, change its name. NU Insurance

H2.text: In 2009 to what did the United Kingdom’s largest insurance company, Norwich Union, change its name. Britannia Insurance

H3.text: In 2009 to what did the United Kingdom’s largest insurance company, Norwich Union, change its name. CGNU

A4.text: In April 2002, the company's shareholders voted to change the company name to Aviva plc

A5.text: The name of the company upon its formation in May 2000 was CGNU plc
